Entry.Val: A surprise hit with the sword pommel on a single target, increasing their Delay.
Focus on defense and increase your shields after being hit. Shielding bonus is equal to 40% of the character's Perception.
Focus on defense and increase the shields of all allies on the battlefield upon being played. Shielding bonus is equal to 5% of the character's current shielding.
Wide swings of this weapon will check nearby enemies, lowering their power and speed.
Continuous attacks by this weapon overwhelm opponents and add to your own momentum. Scales to Wits.
